name: gomft
description: GoMFT provides a command-line interface for reading and processing NTFS Master File Table (MFT) entries. Useful for forensics and investigations in file integrity or recovery cases.
features: MFT Parsing: Read and process NTFS Master File Table entries for forensic analysis.
Forensic Investigation: Extract file metadata, timestamps, and attributes from NTFS volumes.
File Recovery: Identify deleted or hidden files through MFT analysis.
Integrity Analysis: Verify file system integrity and detect anomalies in file records.
Command-Line Interface: Efficient CLI tool for scripting and automated forensic workflows.
Detailed Output: Export MFT data in various formats for further analysis and reporting.
Timeline Construction: Build file system timelines from MFT timestamps for incident response.
Cross-Platform: Analyze NTFS volumes from Linux, macOS, or Windows systems.
